title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Student-Led English Speaking Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can use English expressions appropriate for daily life scenarios (e.g., restaurant ordering, shopping, public transportation) in augmented reality environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can maintain continuous English conversations for over 10 minutes through role-play activities with peer learners.
Learners can improve self-assessment scores for speaking ability by over 30% through pre-/post-assessment comparisons.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
